title: What we have to say after eating By Assim Al Hakeem
transcript: Haroon says what do we have to say after we finish eating you say al hamdulillah holiday how many Huaraz a penny mean right how the menu arakawa this is authentic if you say just simply al hamdulillah this suffice Allah Almighty as the Prophet said I so Salam is pleased when his servant eats or drinks and then praises him by saying at hamdulillah imagine he gives you the food he gives you the drink to eat he gives you everything that you need and not only that he is happy he is pleased when you praise him for that so this is a great thing to do I
